definition: strong-smelling vegetable (garlic etc)/non-vegetarian food (meat, fish etc)/vulgar/obscene
grass radical 草字頭兒|草字头儿[cao3 zi4 tou2 r5]
non-vegetarian dish (including meat, fish, garlic, onion etc)
to eat meat after having maintained a vegetarian diet/(fig.) to do sth as a novel experience
(Buddhism etc) the five forbidden pungent vegetables: leek, scallion, garlic, rape and coriander
to eat meat and drink wine
dirty jokes/jokes of a visceral nature
an ethnic group in ancient northern China
very pungent and spicy vegetable dishes (a common Buddhist term)

sentences.english: Toto I've got a feeling we're not in Kansas anymore.
sentences.chinese: 託託，我有一種感覺我們再也葷芻了家了。

sentences.english: B: The only animal product I eat is eggs(?check).
sentences.chinese: 我喫的唯一葷類食品是蛋。

sentences.english: The pleasant odour of the savoury and greasy mess blended with the smell of smoke.
sentences.chinese: 沾了油葷的美味食物的香味混合着煙味。

sentences.english: Dinner was two meat dishes and one vegetable dish, H.'s mother's preparations.
sentences.chinese: H的母親準備的晚飯，兩葷一素。

sentences.english: He was extremely muscular, an adventurer, and he would tell these bawdy stories.
sentences.chinese: 他是肌肉猛男，一個冒險家，而且會講葷故事。

sentences.english: On the other hand, your stomach would turn at the idea of frying potatoes in animal fat.
sentences.chinese: 另一方面，你一想到葷油炸土豆就會反胃。

sentences.english: But the soup might turn out to be pretty meaty.
sentences.chinese: 但是這湯看起來其實也挺“葷”的。

sentences.english: Costing of digital goods is the key factor in pricing.
sentences.chinese: 數字產品的敗本構造非決議其訂價的閉鍵果葷。

definition: (video games) PlayerUnknown's Battlegrounds (PUBG)/battle royale game/last-man-standing game/to play PUBG (or similar game)/to win at PUBG (or similar game)
to stop/to cease/to dismiss/to suspend/to quit/to finish
